name: XRRenderStateInit
description: The XRRenderStateInit dictionary is a writeable version of the XRRenderState interface, and is used when calling an XRSession's updateRenderState() method to apply changes to the render state prior to rendering the next frame.

refs.name: WebXR Device API
refs.description: The definition of 'XRRenderStateInit' in the 'WebXR Device API' specification.
